  • Methodendetails

    • checkPlayerHitBox

      public void checkPlayerHitBox()
      This function checks if the enemy image overlaps with the player image. If the player approaches from above, they defeat the enemy; otherwise, the player loses one life.

    • playerKillsEnemy

      public void playerKillsEnemy()
      Defines the enemy object as dead.

    • onEnemyHitsPlayer

      public void onEnemyHitsPlayer()
      This function is executed when the enemy touches the player. The player loses one life. Then, it checks if the player has more than one life remaining. If not, the player dies and the game ends. Otherwise, the player enters a safe time where they cannot take damage.

    • setEnemySpawn

      public void setEnemySpawn(double x, double y)
      At these coordinates, the enemy is placed in the game.
      Parameter:
      x -
      y -
